name: Junagram
short_description:
Junagram is personal facebook application created by Juna Firmansyah for now only Juna Firmansyah can use, it allow upload photo and video to facebook, export photo and video to memory card and lot more you can do with Junagram.

Junagram filters digitally enhance your photos to look more attractive and awesome.

Features: 

- overall enhances your photo quality and make it look better than original. 

- borders will create frame around your photos to look more attractive 

- a more textural look to your photo 

- set of filters selected by us which would be combination of above three categories (effects, borders and patterns). You can use these effects for quick actions or else you can filter your photo manually by selecting any filters from the above categories in combination.

- Upload to Facebook: after applying filters on the photo you can upload the same to Facebook

- Export to memory card: you also have choice to export photo to memory card.
summary: Juna Firmansyah personal photo and video uploader
